availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James T. Hughes (Union Co, Ky, farmer)

body.p: Union County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Lucy Floyd Hughes in Union County on September 30th, 1815. Father of Nathaniel J. Hughes, James Hughes, Samuel Hughes, Albina Hughes. Resident in Union County in 1830. Owned seven enslaved persons in Union County in 1830. Resident in Union County in 1840. Owned seven enslaved persons in Union County in 1840. Farmer in Union County in 1850. Owned eight enslaved persons in Union County in 1850. Farmer in Union County in 1860. Owned five enslaved persons in Union County in 1860.
